sec.p: We thank Craig Moritz, Robert Hijmans, Juan Parra, John Weins, Pedro Tarroso, Kristy Deiner, and Jack Dumbacher for providing helpful comments throughout the development of the study and during manuscript preparation. Additional thanks to Town Peterson and Darren Irwin for reviews that greatly improved an earlier version of the manuscript. Special thanks to Jeanne Robertson for making published data available and providing photographs.
